mapper.select: select aps.setting_id as settingId, aps.on_off as onOff, ast.name as settingName, ast.id as id, ast.parent_id as parentId from app_personal_setting aps left join app_setting_type ast on aps.setting_id=ast.id where ast.is_delete=0 AND ast.classify=#{classify} and aps.user_id=#{userId}
